author: Bristol Post
title: Ground News - Met Office issues two-day severe weather warnings amid new storm alert
text:
Summary by Bristol Post Forecasters warn of delays on roads and rails and possible power cuts amid wind speeds of up to 75mph Share menu More
Filters 3 Articles 3 Articles All Left Center Right
Daily Express Lean Right Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: Reach Plc Met Office issues two-day storm warning for brutal system to smash UK in hours The yellow warnings cover much of southern England, western Wales and Northern Ireland.
